metadata.synopsis: One-liner dialog for a citizen who just entered the circus. He is the civilian who is being sniffed by the ghoul as you enter the checkpoint scene.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Debug book > Act 3 > Wyrm's Crossing > Circus of the Last Days. Do the checkpoint scene and you can then get this civilian's one-liners.

0.speaker: Montgomery
0.text: What's this - what in the hells is all the yelling about? Is this another show?
0.context: NodeContext: little panic, can hear screams in the distance

1.speaker: Montgomery
1.text: I've heard the djinni is something else. This circus better be worth the hassle.

2.speaker: Montgomery
2.text: Did you see that bloody ghoul at the entrance? Sniffing us, of all things! What kind of circus is this?
